articles.description: You’ll have to be transparent about your use of AI as a developer
articles.content:
Summary
<ul><li> Google is calling for app developers to be more responsible with AI-generated content, asking them to report or flag potentially offensive content to enhance content filtering and m… [+3376 chars]
